name: Stealingrad
description:
Equality is nice, but what if I get more?

How to play: Click or press any key to count faster and upgrade your levels.

Goal: To steal as much as money without getting caught. Note: In case you stuck caused by some bug that we couldn't catch, press R to reset the game.

We have developed this small idle game within ~48 by eating lots of munchies and slacking most of the time. Hope you enjoy it as much as we did while creating it!

Game Design & Development: Burak Kürkçü
Art: Elif Tavkul
Sound: Ayşe Yörükoğlu & Mustafa Berk Ilkıç
